Level One
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level One
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, July 14, 2001 - 04:57 am:

AHEM,I DECIDED TO CONTRIBUTE MORE TO MRM(Monster Eancher Metropolis.) So,I'm currently playing Monster Rancher Explorer. So,I'm trying to create every details to help everyone win Monster Rancher Explorer. NOTE: I created all this,no copyrighting without my permission. I'll add more and more each day,and PLEASE and Thanks for your help,moderators,to transfer all the Strategy here,to the strategy section of MRE(Monster Rancher Explorer).


TIPS TO DEFEAT EACH STAGE

STAGE 1

From where you start,create a box,next to you. Than jump on the box which you just created. After that move right only once,than jump up that box,and take the "fireworks." When you have taked the fireworks and standing on top that box, Wait for the Jell to go to the box next to you. Once it's standing on top the box,destroy the box,and he will fall and die. After that,turn left,and create a box(Turn left,not jump down left.) Jump up those boxes,and get the "golden Key." Face right,and create a box,next/bottom/right to you,and keep doing that,until you reach the dorr,and enter the door,AND YOU WIN STAGE 1.
